Interface SQLDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLDatabase, SQLiteDatabase

    public interface SQLDatabase
    Since:
    0.4.24.23
    Author:
    MorkaZ, Exortions

      Send query through connection with synchronization with main thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getDatabaseType

        SQLDatabaseType getDatabaseType()

      • updateAsync

        void updateAsync(String query)

        Send query through connection asynchronously in background. It will not affect TPS, but it will work asynchronously.

        Also, database will be updated in delay and data will not be synchronous. It will be unable to get data from database instantly after update in another line of code.

        Parameters:
        query - the query.

      • updateSync

        Boolean updateSync(String query)

        Send query through connection with synchronization with main thread. It will affect TPS depends of connection quality.

        Parameters:
        query - the query.

      • getResult

        ResultSet getResult(String query)

        Data from ResultSet can be get using ResultSetManager from this plugin.

        Parameters:
        query - the query.

      • createConnection

        Connection createConnection(String... data)

        data values are different depend on type of SQL connection.

        Parameters:
        data - The data for the SQL conn.

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection()
        Gets the SQL conn.
        Returns:
        The SQL conn.

      • isConnected

        Boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        If the SQL db is connected

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
        Closes the SQL conn.

      • removeObjectSync

        void removeObjectSync(String table,
                      String keyColumn,
                      Object keyValue,
                      String objectColumn)

        Keys are used to find correct row.

        removeObjectSync("SQLTable", "nick", "Steve", "money");

        Parameters:
        table - The table.
        keyColumn - The column
        keyValue - The value
        objectColumn - The object

        Parameters:

        keyColumn - The column
        keyValue - The value
        objectColumn - The object
        objectValue - The value
        hasTablePrimaryKey - If it is a PK

      • setObjectsSync

        void setObjectsSync(String table,
                    List<org.bukkit.craftbukkit.libs.org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,Object>> pairs,
                    Boolean hasTablePrimaryKey)

        Apache commons lib is required for Pair class.

        Left value is column, Right value is value object of column.

        Parameters:
        table - The table.
        pairs - The pairs for str and obj
        hasTablePrimaryKey - If it is a PK

      • setObjectsAsync

        void setObjectsAsync(String table,
                     List<org.bukkit.craftbukkit.libs.org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,Object>> pairs,
                     Boolean hasTablePrimaryKey)

        Apache commons lib is required for Pair class.

        Left value is column, Right value is value object of column.

        Parameters:
        table - The table.
        pairs - The pairs for str and obj
        hasTablePrimaryKey - If it is a PK
